whisk.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: to mix liquid, eggs etc very quickly so that air is mixed in, using a fork or a whisk
whisk.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: to take someone or something quickly away from a place
whisk.translation[0].definitions[1].exam: The waitress whisked our coffee cups away before weâ€™d had a chance to finish.
whisk.translation[1].definitions[0].defi: a small kitchen tool made of curved pieces of wire, used for mixing air into eggs, cream etc
